snippet.title: Lawmage Academy - Official Gameplay Trailer (2021)
snippet.description:
Learn spells, craft potions, make friends, and go on exciting adventures as you uncover the dark secrets of Lawmage Academy.

Download the demo now!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1377710/Lawmage_Academy/

Itch: https://verinius.itch.io/lawmage-academy

Join the Lawmage Academy Discord server and meet your fellow candidates!

Discord: https://discord.gg/DqSbz84
